title: Black screen during champ select, than a time penalty...wtf?
body:
Not sure if someone has encountered this before, but my screen went black when I got into champ select. I can't select or see anything obviously, so the queue is disbanded due to me not doing anything. 

Got slapped with a time penalty when I tried to queue up again. 

Thanks Riot!

replies.body: Hey sorry about the lower priority queue caused as a result of this.  :(  This issue is usually caused by a connection problem that can't download assets and reach the game server.  Your best bet is to go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and test it in a custom game to prevent further penalties.
